title: Rp scam?
body: Once upon a time i brought rp ( very rare $20) and i brought some skins and stuff while my dad told me that $40 got charged to the Paypal and i was like 'Dafuq wasnt me' while in my mind i was like did it scam me? So i ask today is that cause im from nz or something cause now im scared of using Paypal/Buying rp. HELP!
